casebody.data:
CROWN CORK & SEAL COMPANY, Inc., Plaintiff-Appellant, v. UNITED STATES of America, Defendant-Appellee. No. 44. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Nov. 5, 1934. James 0. Wynn, of New York City (George G. Blattmachr, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Prank J. Wideman, Asst. Atty. Gen., and Scwall Key, Norman D. Keller, and Frederick W. Dewart, Sp. Acsts. to Atty. Gen. (Leo J. Hickey, U. S. Atty., of Brooklyn, N. Y., of counsel), for the United Stales.

Before - MANTON, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment (4 F. Supp. 525) affirmed.
